reference.shortdesc: The tutorialinfo element contains additional information that is useful when the task topic is part of a tutorial.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The tutorialinfo element is specialized from div. It is defined in the task module.

refbody.example:
Example
The following code sample shows how the tutorialinfo element might be used in a task topic that is part of a tutorial.<steps> <step> <cmd>Do this</cmd> <tutorialinfo>In your editor, open the first element and click on the dialog. </tutorialinfo> </step> <step> <cmd>Do that</cmd> <tutorialinfo>Move the framulator into the foobar box.</tutorialinfo> </step> </steps>Â
